mosinstall.name: Make Contact
mosinstall.author: Joomla! Bamboo
mosinstall.description: This is a simple email form for you to load into a module rather than using the Core Joomla Contact module. Just enter the email address and message title in the backend (as well as your success and error message) and publish the module and you have a very simple contact form.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: introduction
param.label: Introduction Text
param.description: Enter a brief introduction to appear before the form.

param.name: from_email
param.label: Email destination
param.description: Enter a valid email where the form will be sent to.

param.name: from_subject
param.label: Email subject
param.description: Enter a subject for the email being sent.

param.name: thanks
param.label: Thankyou Message
param.description: Enter a message to be displayed after a successful email has been sent.

param.name: error
param.label: Error Message
param.description: Enter a message to be displayed if the details are incomplete.
